artist: Circle of Marcantonio Bassetti; Unknown Italian (Verona?), 17th century
creditline: Gift of the Alfred K. Moir Trust
provenance: Sale, Sotheby's, London, July 9, 1999, no. 108, with pendant, for £2, 500, to Flavia Ormand for Moir; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1999-d. 2010; bequeathed to Condos); Barbara Moir Condos, Chevy Chase, Maryland (2010-12)
title: Explusion from the Garden of Eden
